item.title: High Frequency (HF) Communication System – One Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative while conducting operations that require two LRCS provided:

numlitem.para: SATCOM voice or data link is operative,
Alternate procedures are established and used,
SATCOM coverage is available over the intended route of flight, and
If Inmarsat codes are not available while using SATCOM voice, prior coordination with the appropriate ATS facilities is required.

note.para: SATCOM is to be used only as a backup to normal HF communications unless otherwise authorized by the appropriate ATS facilities.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: For International Operations, the Captain will contact Flight Control to determine ATC and company VHF/HF/SATCOM communication requirements.
The Dispatcher and Captain will refer to OPS Spec B50.
Reference FOM Communications chapter for additional information.
One may be inoperative provided SATCOM Data Link is operative and SATCOM coverage is available over the intended route of flight.

placard.para: Placard near HF Control Panel "L (R) HF INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
